data.name: The Day I Died - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains the two music tracks available in the game (menu music and end game music), as well as a bonus track.
See announcments on TDID store page for details and sample music from all three tracks.
data.about_the_game:
This DLC contains the two music tracks available in the game (menu music and end game music), as well as a bonus track.
See announcments on TDID store page for details and sample music from all three tracks.
data.short_description: Soundtrack of the game, as well as an astonishing bonus track!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA速 GeForce速 GTX 950 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA速 GeForce速 GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio
